name: Deadly Race
description:
Choose a highway for the deadly race and get ready to drive your speedy car in conditions of heavy traffic. Bypass the other cars, try to catch Turbo Boost bonus, that speed up your car and allows you to ram other cars without any damage for you, and earn coins. Collect coins and open new cars in your garage. Enjoy the deadly race and don't forget about petrol! This game template created using Construct 2. 

Buy the game source (CAPX file).
